Abyssal Gaze.effect: Deal severe Almighty damage to all foes.

Arms Master.effect: Half HP cost for physical skills.

Blade of Rebellion.effect: Deal severe Almighty damage to 1 for with extra effectiveness if down.

Charge.effect: Multiply user's next Phys attack damage by 2.5.

Charge All.effect: Multiply all allies' next Phys attack damage by 2.5.

Concentrate.effect: Multiply user's next magical attack damage by 2.5.

Concentrate All.effect: Multiply all allies' next Magic attack damage by 2.5.

Gattling Blows.effect: Deal 2 to 4 times medium Phys damage to all foes.

Kill Rush.effect: Deal 1-3 times light Phys damage to 1 foe.

Laevatein.effect: Deal severe Phys damage to 1 foe.

Life Wall.effect: Repels next non-almighty attack for all allies.

Majestic Aura.effect: Doubles effectiveness and may decrease costs of Recovery skills

Makarakarn.effect: Create a shield on 1 ally to repel 1 magical attack.

Marakunda.effect: Decrease all foes' Defense for 3 turns.

Masquerade.effect: Deal 2 times severe Phys damage to 1 foe.

Masukunda.effect: Decrease all foes' Agility for 3 turns.

Matarukaja.effect: Increase party's Attack power for 3 turns.

Matarunda.effect: Decrease all foes' Attack power for 3 turns.

Miracle Rush.effect: Deal medium Phys damage to all foes. High critical rate.

Myriad Blooms.effect: Increase all allies' Attack, Defense and Agility for 3 turns.

Neo Cadenza.effect: Restore 50% HP of party and increase attack, defense, and evasion rate.

Phantom Show.effect: Inflict Sleep (high odds) to all foes.

Power Slash.effect: Deal medium Phys damage to 1 foe.

Saintly Devotion.effect: Revive and fully restore HP for all allies.

Saintly Embrace.effect: Recover 25% max HP each turn in battle.

Saintly Words.effect: Recover 15% max HP and SP each turn in battle.

Sorcery.effect: Chance to halve ally costs for attack spells

Swift Strike.effect: Deal 2 to 4 times weak Phys damage to all foes.

Tetrakarn.effect: Create a shield on 1 ally to repel 1 Phys attack.
